docs.text: clive-owen ¶ A simple one-file CLI package. Demonstrates the following: How to implement a simple command line utility with Click, in a single .py file How to create a setup.py file alongside the CLI utility, for a bare-minimum installation How to implement git pre-commit hooks Quick start ¶ pip install --editable . clive --help
docs.title: Index
